content:
ProjectInstanceSettings Enum

Definition

Contains settings for controlling project instance creation.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public enum ProjectInstanceSettings
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ProjectInstanceSettings
Attributes
FlagsAttribute

Fields

Immutable

Create immutable instance of project.
ImmutableWithFastItemLookup

Create immutable instance of project with look up table that improves performance.
None

Create project instance with no options.
